price: 97. Nous savons que tu as des serrements au cœur (en entendant) ce qu’ils disent.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ نَعۡلَمُ أَنَّكَ يَضِيقُ صَدۡرُكَ بِمَا يَقُولُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: walaqad naʿlamu annaka yaḍīqu ṣadruka bimā yaqūlūna
